snippet: A woman said she had been held hostage and raped by international peacekeepers, and the case could strain ties between the public and foreign troops in the country.
abstract: African Union and Somali government say they are working together to investigate allegations by Somali woman that she was held hostage and gang-raped by international peacekeepers; case has prompted local outrage and could strain ties between the public and foreign troops in the country.
lead_paragraph: A woman said she had been held hostage and raped by international peacekeepers, and the case could strain ties between the public and foreign troops in the country.

headline.main: African Union and Somalia to Investigate Rape Accusation
headline.print_headline: African Union And Somalia To Investigate Rape Claims
